card.title: The Perfect Setting
card.paragraph1: Imagine saying 'I do' in one of the most emblematic places in the world, with the city of Rio de Janeiro at your feet and Christ blessing every moment. Christ the Redeemer now hosts unique ceremonies, offering an unforgettable celestial experience for you and your guests.
card.paragraph2: Choose between the charm of sunrise, with the golden sky announcing a new beginning, or the magic of a starry night, when love shines even brighter. Every moment is a blessing, every detail, a symbol of eternity.
card.paragraph3: With the support and experience of Leco Biagioni's office, your dream takes shape â€” with all the structure, planning and emotion that a wedding in this sacred setting deserves.
card.paragraph4: Realize your dream wedding at the top of Corcovado and immortalize your love under the world's most famous view.

about.title: About Us
about.name: Leco Biagioni
about.description: Our advisory and ceremonial team, led by Leco Biagioni, is here to transform your wedding into a unique and unforgettable experience. With years of experience and an eye for detail, we ensure that every moment is perfect. Leco Biagioni works with the best suppliers in the market, and the couple will have their advisory from start to finish.
